Package info.jonclark.treegraft.core.formatting.parses

Transforms parses into strings including such transformations as transduction from source to target languages.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
MonoParseFormatter<T extends Token> A ParseFormatter for a MonoCFGRule.
ParseFormatter<R extends GrammarRule<T>,T extends Token> Formats a the data contained in a Key into a partial (or complete) parse, which could result in a source tree, target tree, or target string.
SyncParseFormatter<T extends Token> A ParseFormatter for a SyncCFGRule that allows outputting parses as a source tree, target tree, or target string; This class is where the magic of transduction from source to target is actually defined.
 

Enum Summary
ParseFormatter.OutputType Specifies the type of the parse that will be constructed by this ParseFormatter.
 

Package info.jonclark.treegraft.core.formatting.parses Description

Transforms parses into strings including such transformations as transduction from source to target languages.
